name: The Purple Tower
description:
Description

The prince has a bit of a spider problem and he needs your help to clean out his tower.

Made in 7 days as a part of the Dungeon Crawler 2021 Game Jam.

Gameplay
  • Arrow Keys  to move you character
  • Space to wait a turn
  • Walk into spiders to attack
  • Walk into stairs to go up and down
  • Kill all the spiders on each floor to complete the game
  • Walking on unexplored tiles will heal you one point
Attribution
  • All models created by Quaternius https://quaternius.com/
  • The font "The King is Dead" by poppants https://poppants.itch.io/the-king-is-dead-long-live-the-queen-pixel-fonts
  • The font "at01" created by Grafxkid https://grafxkid.itch.io/at01
Known Issues
  • Issue with the player movement that can cause discomfort
  • Slow player movement
  • Enemies do not turn toward the player 
  • Enemies sometimes appear in the stairs and attack the player when transitioning between levels
  • Player can move after game over screen
  • Export size is unnecessarily large (about 3 times too large). This causes issues mostly in the web version

These issues are being addressed in a post-voting update
